lexUnit.name: supporter.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: one who has taken a position in support of an issue.

sentence.text: All his life he was a staunch supporter of the Bible as the ultimate truth and proclaimed this at the famous Oxford debate on evolution .
Mr Leach had told the court that Curtis had been a staunch supporter of the anti-smoking campaign and that his father had died from lung cancer .
